name_english: Heisei Dog Stories Bow
name_japanese: 平成イヌ物語バウ
description:
The story is set in primitive times,in a village which is home to Bow, Sayaka, and other funny characters. The village is suffering from a shortage of food. To resolve this critical situation, Inugami’s grandmother makes a prophesy: “The chosen one will save the village with a great animal.”

Following this prophesy, Bow, Sayaka, Inugami, and Sabu set out together on a journey. Sayaka expends great effort trying to capture a mammoth, while Bow causes confusion by fooling around in his usual way…

(Source: Nipponanimation)

name_japanese: 平成松江怪談
description:
A Matsue City collaboration anime with Eagle Talon. Yoshida book-ends the story as modern horror tales, originated within the city, are narrated by another person. The shorts are meant to promote the Patrick Lafcadio Hearn's Ghost Tour offered by the city.

Some episodes feature biographical segments of the Matsue Kankou Taishi Sanri ga Iku! Matsue Ghost Tour group.

name_japanese: 平成松江怪談～怪し～
description: A Matsue City collaboration anime with Eagle Talon. Yoshida book-ends the story as horror tales, both modern and historical, originated within the city are narrated by another person.

name_japanese: 平成のシンデレラ 紀子さま物語
description: The special is confined to the wedding of Prince Akishino with his chosen Kiko Kawashima.

name_japanese: へ～せいポリスメン!!
description:
Gougou, the man who deals with himself, strangers and the society as a whole at his own pace. He tends to confuse his surroundings beginning with his unique name, but surprisingly his job is upholding law and order as policeman; however, his way of life as modern time policeman leaves his superiors, civilians and even criminals dumbfounded. It's the new type of police comedy the Heisei-era has brought forth.

(Source: Translation from NicoNico Douga, edited)

name_japanese: 平成天才バカボン
description:
A comedy about a former genius who has now become very eccentric and senile. His family deals with all the crazy problems he and his old friends cause around the neighborhood.

(Source: AniDB)

name_english: Together with Helen, Anne Sullivan
name_japanese: ヘレンと共に　アニー・サリバン-
description:
Anne Sullivan is the woman who became a tutor for Helen Keller, a girl who was deaf, dumb, and blind. Anne decides to be her tutor to give Helen joy of life, no matter how little. She stays with Helen all the time and dedicates herself to Helen's education. However, things doesn't go as well as she expects and she has a very difficult time day to day. On the other side, she has hope, and teaches braille to Helen. One summer’s day, Helen was given well water in her hand, and finally she understood the meaning of the word 'Water'.

(Source: Official Site)

name_japanese: ヘリタコぷーちゃん
description: Based on the manga by Sasaki Takemaru.

name_japanese: ハローアゲイン，ＪｏＪｏ
description: Music video for the song Hello Again, JoJo by Ayaka Hirahara that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Hans Bacher and Polygon Pictures.

name_english: Hello Cocomong
name_japanese: 헬로 코코몽
description: I can dance! I can sing! So, I can speak English! Hello Cocomong is a series of musical episodes teaching kids through song and dance. A large amount of episodes are aimed to teach English to Korean speaking children, though the intention is lost with the official English dub of the show.

name_english: Hello Cocomong 2
name_japanese: 헬로 코코몽2
description: The second season of Hello Cocomong.

name_english: Hello Jadoo
description: Hello Jadoo is a South-Korean TV show about a girl named Choi Jadoo who is a very free-spirited girl. In every episode, she would always get into drama, whether it was with her parents or school. At the same time, she meets new people and she tries to solve problems occurring.

name_english: Hello Kagerou
name_japanese: ハロー カゲロ
description: Official music video for GReeeeN's 31st single Hello Kagerou released on February 7, 2018. A shortened version of the music video was posted on GReeeeN's official YouTube channel on January 11, 2018 to promote the full release as well as several campaigns as the song itself is the official relay theme song for Fuji TV's broadcast of the 2018 Pyeongchang Olympics.

name_english: Hello Kitty in The Circus Comes to Town
name_japanese: ハローキティのサーカスがやってきた
description: Kitty and company are super excited for the circus that has come to town, but it might close down leaving everyone jobless and abandoned. It's up to them to get enough people to attend so it can make a profit.

name_japanese: ハローキティのキティのふしぎなみずうみ
description: Kitty and Mimmy hear about the mysteries of a lake when they go up to fish with their Papa. At night they discover a Loch Ness monster like creature and fairy. The monster does not want to live in the lake anime due to illegal dumping which is also causing the fish to leave. The girls recruit a grandmother witch to help the monster gain the ability of flight so it can leave. But it asks the witch to also clear the lake of debris too. Now it can live happily in its lake.

name_japanese: ハローキティのはじめてのクリスマスケーキ
description: Kitty and Mimmy try to bake a Christmas cake for the first time as a gift to their grandparents. But it's much harder than it looks.

name_english: Hello Kitty & Dear Daniel in Hansel & Gretel
name_japanese: ハローキティのヘンゼルとグレーテル
description: Kitty and friends re-create the story of Hansel and Gretel.

name_japanese: ハローキティのハッピー!仮装大会
description: Halloween is around the corner. The local apple farmer was asked to host the costume contest. He and his son end up getting into a fight and the boy decides to leave home. But before he does, he sees his dad failing at being a host. He borrows his friend's costume and jumps in to rescue the show. But even after, both still are angry at each other. Kitty and Mimmy try to reconcile their differences in order to keep the farmer family together.

name_english: Hello Kitty in the Bamboo Princess
name_japanese: ハローキティのかぐや姫
description: Kitty and friends recreate the story of The Tale of the Bamboo Cutter.

name_english: Hello Kitty in Santa's Missing Hat
name_japanese: ハローキティのきえたサンタさんの帽子
description: The Santa decoration at the church has had its hat blown away. Kitty and Mimmy go out to find it in time for Christmas.

name_japanese: ハローキティのきえたサンタさんのおくりもの
description: Kitty and Mimmy are preparing for Santa's visit by making him cookies.

name_english: Hello Kitty in The Nutcracker
name_japanese: ハローキティのくるみ割り人形
description: Hello Kitty version of The Nutcracker.

name_japanese: ハローキティのロンドンにおりた宇宙人
description: In this original story by Hoshiyama Hiroyuki, Kitty White hears from friends about recent UFO sightings and goes to inspect one of the UFO crash sites, to learn more about it and the aliens that came with it.

name_english: Hello Kitty in The Magic Apple
name_japanese: ハローキティのまほうのリンゴ
description: Kitty yearns for a magical adventure and suddenly gets one when a magic apple turns her into a princess.

name_english: Hello Kitty in The Little Match Girl
name_japanese: ハローキティのマッチ売りの少女
description: Hello Kitty re-creates the story of The Little Match Girl.

name_japanese: ハローキティのみんなの森をまもれ!
description: One day, Kitty notices a part of the forest she plays in almost every day has died. Insects come and ask Kitty to help fight a witch who is causing it.

name_japanese: ハローキティのみんなの楽しい夏休み
description: Kitty and Mimmy go to the south islands for summer vacation. There they meet an old man that seems familiar (aka Santa-san). Will the old man's secret be found out?

name_english: Hello Kitty in Momotaro
name_japanese: ハローキティの桃太郎
description: Kitty and friends re-create the story of Momotarou.

name_english: Hello Kitty in Puss in Boots
name_japanese: ハローキティの長靴をはいた猫
description: Kitty and friends recreate the story of Puss in Boots.

name_japanese: ハローキティのおかぜをひいたサンタさん
description: Santa-san has caught a cold after falling into a lake. It's up to Kitty and her friends to make sure Christmas happens on time.

name_english: Hello Kitty & Mimmy in King Midas' Donkey Ears
name_japanese: ハローキティの王様の耳はロバの耳
description: Kitty and friends recreate the story of King Midas.

name_japanese: ハローキティのおやゆびひめ
description: A Hello Kitty theatrical version of Thumbelina.

name_japanese: ハローキティのパパなんて大きらい
description: Kitty and Mimmy were supposed to have a fun day with their Papa. But he received a call from the town counsel asking for his help in building a flood wall to combat the impending typhoon. Kitty becomes mad that Papa has to cancel their plans and says that she hates him. Mimmy understands that Papa has to save their lives and tries to show Kitty that as well by fighting against her sister's tantrum.

name_english: Hello Kitty, Mimmy and Dear Daniel in the Three Little Pigs
name_japanese: ハローキティの3匹の子ぶた
description: Kitty and friends re-create the story of The Three Little Pigs.

name_japanese: ハローキティのサンタさんが二人いた
description: What if there were two Santas? When Santa-san doesn't receive a single Christmas letter he wonders if everyone forgot. But no, that's impossible! Someone else secretly took the letters and he's on the case to find the second Santa.

name_japanese: ハローキティの幸せの青いホタル
description: A trip to camping with Kitty and her class.

name_japanese: ハローキティの幸せのチューリップ
description: Kitty falls ill and has to stay home with her mom while her sister and Papa and classmates get to go on a field-trip. They encounter a motorcycle riding man who helps out both Mimmy and Kitty. Everyone seems to think he's a bad person but he just has a sad past. Kitty and Mama hear out his story and come to find his lover where she planted many tulips, his favourite flower, while he was away for a long time.

name_japanese: ハローキティの小公女
description: A Hello Kitty telling of the classic A Little Princess novel.

name_english: Hello Kitty in The Wonderful Sisters
name_japanese: ハローキティのすてきな姉妹
description: Kitty and Mimmy try to be the best sisters they can, even to the point of helping each other lie. When things backfire, they learn to appreciate themselves as much as they appreciate each other.

name_english: Hello Kitty in The Day the Big Clock Stopped
name_japanese: ハローキティのとまった大時計
description: London is in havoc when the clock tower stops. With daily schedules leaving people at a loss, Kitty decides to get it working again.

name_english: Hello Kitty in Mom Loves Me After All
name_japanese: ハローキティのやっぱりママがすき
description: Hello Kitty has a fight with her mom. And she discovers that even though they may get into fights, her mother has always and will always love her.

name_english: Hello Kitty and Dear Daniel in The Snow Queen
name_japanese: ハローキティの雪の女王
description: Kitty and friends recreate the story of The Snow Queen.

name_english: Hello Kitty in The Dream Thief
name_japanese: ハローキティの夢どろぼう
description: A mysterious black creature is stealing dreams and causing Mimmy and Kitty to be sleep deprived. It's up to Kitty to catch the thief.

name_english: Hello Kitty in The Prince in His Dream Castle
name_japanese: ハローキティの夢のお城の王子さま
description: Kitty visits an old castle that comes with a legend. All of a sudden, she meets a prince that's just like the one in it!

name_japanese: ハローキティの 郵便屋さんありがとう
description: Kitty's and Mimmy's class find out that Yuubinya-san, their town's postal worker, is having a hard time delivering the mail in his old age. They try to give him a gift as a thank you for all his years of hard work.

name_japanese: ハローキティと見よう イソップ物語
description: Hello Kitty themed Aesop's Fables.

name_japanese: ハローキティと見よう日本むかしばなし
description: Hello Kitty themed Japanese fables.

name_japanese: ハローキティ りんごの森のミステリー
description: Mysterious incidents are occurring in the Apple Forrest. Precious items disappearing, others getting lost, and the prince is missing. It's up to Kitty and Mimmy to solve the cases by becoming detectives!

name_japanese: ハローキティ りんごの森とパラレルタウン
description: Kitty and Mimmy fall through a hole and end up in a parallel world. It's identical to the one the sisters live in but it's inhabited by humans with transparent wings and pointy ears. Kitty becomes friends with Emily, a supermodel in this parallel world, and together they try to rescue Mimmy who has disappeared. Their search is hampered by Akuro--a black cat who has a mean streak.

name_japanese: ハローウィーゴ!
description: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.
